::DarkMouse::

"These scanners can go very far. See that blip over in the corner. 
That's our old ship.  This baby can scan for a long ways out.  What 
are the numbers so I can punch them in for you?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Quickstrike: 
> 
> 
> Quickstrike sighed, trying to think. "Well," he 
said. "There's 'round five 
> markers ah set out there. Do ya think ya can--no that won't work." 
He 
> squinted a crimson optic to think. If they had a computer like Hell 
Beast 
> had, their scanners may pick them up. "How far do these scanners 
go? Real 
> far?"
>
